alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 10 at 8:01PM PDT until April 12 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO 3 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Isolated gusts over 50 mph across higher terrain. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands. * WHEN...From 4 PM Monday to 3 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing dust could bring significant reduction in visibility on Monday. Major roadways that will likely be impacted by the gusty winds and blowing dust include Highways 14 and 138. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
